channel.title: Mohammed A. Imran
channel.description: Application Security Guy, speaker, Null Singapore Leader.

item.title: Finally here !
item.description:
Blogging was on my todo list for a very long long period, but either i was lazy or didn't have time to write.

I intend to blog over here now to share my talks, workshop content and anything which doesnt fit on my slideshare account

-Imran
